719947f-a.title: Manhattan: Fulton Street - Gold Street
719947f-a.text:
Fulton Street (foreground, diagonally from right to left) west from Gold Street (right lower corner) to 4illiam Street, as viewed north westward from No. 111 John Street. Shown is the 19 story Royal Insurance Co. Building and its 2O storv adjunct under construction on the Gold Street frontage. Note to left the old Post Office dome and the overtowering 9oolworth Building. In the far background is the North (Hudson) River and the Jersey
Shore.
July 8, 1939.
P.L. Sperr
719947f-a.folder: Fulton Street & Gold Street, Manhattan, NY

719950f-b.title: Manhattan: Fulton Street - Gold Street
719950f-b.text:
(1)
Fulton Street, at, adjoining and west of the S.W. corner of Gold Street. (as seen through clearance on the N.W. corner). Also shown is Gold Street, west side, south from and including Fulton,
to, but not including Platt Streets.
Ausust 1, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, from a different angle.
AuENt 1, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.
(3)
The same, showing a view from the eastward.
August 1, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.

720020f-a.title: Manhattan: Gold Street - Fulton Street
720020f-a.text:
Gold Street, west side, from Fulton to Ann Streets. Also shown is Ann Street, at the S.W. corner of Gold Street. A portion of Fulton Street, south side, west of Gold Street, is shown aoross the
clearance.
August 1, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.

720019f-a.text:
old Street, south from a point to the south

719948f-b.title: Manhattan: Fulton Street - Gold Street
719948f-b.text:
(1)
Fulton Street, at, adjoining and east of the N.E. corner of Gold Street. Also shown is Gold Street, at the N.E. corner of Fulton Street.
August 1, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, and showing a further view eastward.
May 30, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.

719949f-a.title: Manhattan: Fulton Street - Gold Street
719949f-a.text:
Fulton Street, at, adjoining and west of the N.W. corner of Gold Street. Also shown is Gold Street, west side, north from Fulton, to and
including Ann Streets.
About 1920.
Edwin Levick.
Gift of E. M. Jenks.

720018f-a.text:
